name: 我的变色龙女友My Chameleon Girlfriend
name_original: 我的变色龙女友My Chameleon Girlfriend
description:
My Chameleon Girlfriend is a beautiful AVG visual novel GALGAME developed by YIMI GAME.
A rich bully in love with me? Throw me a "Manhood Handbook"?
The star girl loves me? All the gentle defense you give me?
Forced open, this can't be a pipe dream...
In fact, there is a secret behind the beautiful girl who loves me (Bai Fumi)...
I can't believe they can even change! ?
I'm a rich woman's slave, I'm the school girl's spare?
Rich woman infatuated with all of me, only listen to my words, die-hard!
School flowers love my brave strong struggle smart, vowed to steal me from the hands of the rich woman!
It's a private secret with the leading ladies, my chameleon girlfriend!
My lover is Miss Belly Black, my sidekick is everyone's favorite idol.
Do you prefer a rich woman or a famous woman?





At a young age, the daughter of the REIMS group's chairman is ranked as the 62nd richest person in the world for young people under 30.
She often wears heavy glasses and has a rustic appearance. In fact, hidden behind the heavy glasses of Gigi is a beautiful appearance and a little devil like heart...


The existence of the first school flower. Often active in the major fashion magazines and film screen, is one of the new generation of beautiful female stars.
She is a gentle and clever girl in the eyes of teachers and classmates, but she is a little natural and not good at learning things.
In fact, there is a secret hidden behind Shirley's clever exterior, that is, she is actually a...


Visual novel, through reading the story of the game to choose different options, establish the relationship with the female protagonists, reach different endings.

The problems and difficulties I encountered were also unexpected, but I felt that I could immerse myself in the world surrounded by beautiful girls together.
The initial idea of the project is very simple, that is, I think the boys in the eyes of the beautiful girls are super cute, love love!
And then we're gonna make a Sailor galgame, too. Ha ha.
